title: Equipment Features
tags: where to get equipment in bg3
content:
Helm

While Obscured by shadow, the wearer gains +1 to Saving Throws when attacked.

Adamantine Splint Armour

When a melee attacks hits you, the attacker is sent Reeling for 3 turns.

Reeling condition: Revovering from receiving a terrible blow or hitting a strong metal. Has a -1 penalty to Attack Rolls for every turn remaining.

Adamantine Scale Mail Grymskull Helm Adamantine Splint Armour

When a melee attack hits you, the attacker is sent Reeling for 2 turns.

Reeling condition: Revovering
